question: What is the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and what does it mean for my premiums?
text:
What is the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) and what does it mean for my premiums?
          
        
The I
nflation
R
eduction
A
ct was signed into law by President Biden on August 16, 2022. This Act

extend
s

the enhancements to Affordable Care Act (ACA) premium subsidies originally created by the American Rescue Plan (ARP) which were set to expire at the end of
2022
.Thanks to this new law, Virginia's Insurance Marketplace 888-687-1501
